channel.title: Compiling linux?
channel.description:
[code] javac -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar:deps/jython.jar:deps/xstream.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/poi.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src/server/event/*.java src/server/model/items/*.java src/server/model/minigames/*.java src/server/model/npcs/*.java src/server/model/objects/*.java src/server/model/players/*.java src/server/model/players/skills/*.java src/server/model/players/packets/*.java src/server/model/shops/*.java src/server/net/*.java src/server/task/*.java src/server/util/*.java src/server/world/*.java src/server/util/log/*.java src/server/*.java src/server/world/map/*.java [/code]
using that for my dedi to compile with cmd line
get this error:
[code] javac: file not found: src/server/event/*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options [/code]
can anyone help?

item.title: Compiling linux?
item.dc:creator: @sex-scape_owner sex-scape owner
item.description:
@sex-scape_owner wrote:

erm im allready running the server without wine -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling linux?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

sex-scape owner:

there must be another way. i really dont want to go down the wine route unless its 100% neccesary

Your going to need WINE to run the server too, so you might as well get it.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling linux?
item.dc:creator: @sex-scape_owner sex-scape owner
item.description:
@sex-scape_owner wrote:

there must be another way. i really dont want to go down the wine route unless its 100% neccesary

item.title: Compiling linux?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

“/home/your username here/.wine/dosdevices/c:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_27/bin/javac.exe”

Get WINE. Change ‘javac’ to that.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling linux?
item.dc:creator: @sex-scape_owner sex-scape owner
item.description:

javac -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar:deps/jython.jar:deps/xstream.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/poi.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src/server/event/*.java src/server/model/items/*.java src/server/model/minigames/*.java src/server/model/npcs/*.java src/server/model/objects/*.java src/server/model/players/*.java src/server/model/players/skills/*.java src/server/model/players/packets/*.java src/server/model/shops/*.java src/server/net/*.java src/server/task/*.java src/server/util/*.java src/server/world/*.java src/server/util/log/*.java src/server/*.java src/server/world/map/*.java
